pages.text: Elemental shards - are pieces of very fragile crystal that can contain any element.$(br2)They are pretty common in nature just like iron.

pages.title: How to obtain
pages.text: There is several ways to find them!$(br2)One of them is mining!$(br)They are generating on < Y:40 height and can be mined by a stone pickaxe.

pages.title: How to obtain
pages.text: Second way is to find them in the world! Either in dungeon or from trading.
